column1: * The Eldar pass through Mirkwood and encounter the Anduin and the Misty Mountains. Oromë leads the Vanyar and the Noldor across the river and the Misty Mountains but the Teleri are unwilling.
* Some of the Teleri are led southwards along the Great River by Lenwë and later become known as the Nandor. This is the Second Sundering of the Elves.
